articles.title: CEO Bobby Kotick will leave Activision Blizzard on January 1, 2024 - Ars Technica

articles.title: SpaceX’s Falcon Heavy launches NASA Psyche mission to metal asteroid - TechCrunch
articles.description: Psyche is officially en route to a metal-rich asteroid (also named Psyche) after taking off on a SpaceX Falcon Heavy rocket earlier today.
articles.content:
Godspeed, Psyche.
The large NASA spacecraft is now officially en route to a metal-rich asteroid (also named Psyche) after taking off on a SpaceX Falcon Heavy rocket earlier today. This marks the fir… [+2016 chars]
